import React, { useState } from "react"; import Accordion from "react-bootstrap/Accordion"; import "./Card.css"; function Card(props) { //detect Accordion change const handleAccordionChange = (eventKey) => { console.log(eventKey); setAccordianState(eventKey); }; const [accordianState, setAccordianState] = useState(0); return (

{props.startDate}

{props.endDate}

{accordianState === "1" ? ( <> ) : ( <> )}

{props.position}
{props.location}
  • {props.list1}
  • {props.list2}
  • {props.list3}
); } export default Card;
